title: 'Great day in my life': Spike Lee is marathon grand marshal
text:
Published By: Charlotte Observer: Entertainment - Today 
He's a noted filmmaker, a teacher, an honorary Oscar winner, a crazy New York sports fan and now this: Spike Lee is the next grand marshal o...
